name: Atlas Discuss Quote Form Demo
author: Atlas Soft Web

sections.description:
Atlas Soft Web introduced a plugin form for wordpress which is easy to use from backend side. The plugin form gives you the facility to create as many forms as you want. This form contains specific fields, giving you the choice to select fields without any verge. The selected field will be displayed in the frontend, once it has been stored in the backend of wordpress.
You can create impressive quote forms through backend with the help of Atlas Discuss Quote form. Moreover, it does not require any coding skills that makes the form even more easier and convenient to use.
This plugin form will be displayed in the Quote section of to-do list.

Features include:

  • Manage an unlimited numbers of Form.
  • Support for Shortcode
  • Fully Responsive
  • No coding required
  • Mangable Backend

Documentation

Please take a look at the Atlas Discuss Quote Form documentation before making a support request.

Premium Version

Features

The Full Version allows you to add unlimited number of Fields.

  • Manage an unlimited numbers of Form.
  • Unlimeted number for fields
  • Unlimited number for project scope
  • Support for Shortcode
  • Fully Responsive
  • No coding required
  • Easy Mangable Backend
sections.installation:
1. Upload the discuss-form-demo folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add your forum under ‘Discuss Form’ -> Add New
  4. Add the form to a page with this shortcode: [atlas-discuss-form id=”5″ title=”Project Details”]
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the discuss-form-demo folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add your forum under ‘Discuss Form’ -> Add New
  4. Add the form to a page with this shortcode: [atlas-discuss-form id=”5″ title=”Project Details”]

How do I add the Disuss Form to a page?

Add shortcode that display on Disuss form post type to the page where you want to display the Disuss Form.
Shortcode will look like [atlas-discuss-form id=”5″ title=”Project Details”].

Can I use different form on different page?

yes, you can create as much as form you would like.

Form is not displaying properly?.

Please open a support ticket with details of your issue.

If you find a plugin or theme that causes a conflict, please report it on the support page.

You can find the full documentation here.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Update materialize css to work with boostrap and other themes.

1.0.2

  • Add Demo in name of Plugin. So there is no confusion between pro and Demo.

1.0.1

  • Bug Fix.

1.0

  • Initial release

short_description: An easy to use Quote Form management system that enables users to submit Quote maintain by wordpress backend.
